programme.desc: Anderson Cooper takes you beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight With Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa
programme.desc: Linking the market drivers from overnight in the US and across Asia into the region's trading day, with deep dive analysis of the top business, energy and geopolitical stories shaping decisions.

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: The David Rubenstein Show
programme.desc: Roger Goodell, NFL Commissioner. Roger Goodell talks about NFL's international expansion, allowing private equity firms to take passive minority stakes in teams, and adding an 18th game to the season.

programme.title: Hot Pursuit! 24 Hours Of Le Mans
programme.desc: From the midnight pit stops to the sunrise battles, Matt Miller and Hannah Elliott take you into drivers seat with CEOs, racing legends and the brands competing for the Le Mans edge.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily
programme.desc: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec bring you reporting from the magazine that helps global leaders stay ahead, plus insight on the people, companies and trends shaping today's complex economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Close
programme.desc: Alix Steel, Romaine Bostick and Scarlet Fu own the market-moving breaking news around the closing bell in this must-watch daily program to get an edge on equities, earnings and the economy.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Investigates
programme.desc: Alleged scammers in the UK are accused of defrauding would-be migrant healthcare workers out of tens of thousands of pounds. Some victims have turned to a vigilante 'scammer hunter' for help.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.desc: In the Flatlands, Furgie feels obligated to help the pregnant widow that was left behind after his brawl with Brutus. .

programme.title: Legends Of Venom
programme.desc: Black mambas are one of the most feared snakes on the planet. But behind the twitchy demeanour and lightning-fast strike is a shy and highly intelligent creature, just trying to get through the hot, snakey summer alive. This legendary serpent has a plethora of assets - venom, agility, speed and sensory superpowers - that make it a master its habitat, despite being the most hated serpent in Africa.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: Now that the pups have arrived, Dogtown is officially under new management. In the Flatlands, June tries to help her risk-averse pup find his confidence, while Ruby faces off against an invading Prairie Dog family.

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: With nourishing food scarce in the Highlands, Charlotte must learn to fight back against bullies to survive the harsh dry season.

programme.title: Africa's Deadliest: Unlikely Killers Compilation
programme.desc: Africa has its notorious killers, but other unlikely animals are rewriting the rules of the predator playbook. The mantis shrimp packs a punch with a force of a .22 caliber bullet, secretary birds take down threats with lethal legs, and the honey badger bullies off on a pack of wild dogs. Some of the continent‚Äôs most unexpected creatures can be the deadliest.

programme.title: When Predators Attack
programme.desc: The world's super reptiles are on a collision course with humans. And we're no match for their prehistoric power..

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killer Three
programme.desc: These are predators whose appetites exceed any sense of self-control. These are the Worlds Deadliest: Hunger Games. Whether its the Burmese python eating every creature in sight in the Florida everglades; the tiger shark gobbling up giant schools of sardines; or the man-eating Tsavo lion terrorizing the African savannah, Hunger Games shows you animals whose diets never say die. .

programme.title: Wild Hunters: Deadly Killers of Africa
programme.desc: Journey across Africa exploring the continent's most iconic and deadliest predators. These African stories are a show of raw power, strength and endurance. An awe-inspiring display of the fierce, everyday battles fought in the wild.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killer Three
programme.desc: The animal world is full of predators who can kill in the blink of an eye. These are the World's Deadliest: Speed Kills -- and they dish out death like fast food. From the fleet-footed cheetah, to the stargazer fish that swallows prey in a tenth of a second, to the venomous black mamba -- the fastest and deadliest snake in the world -- Speed Kills puts you in the line of fire to show you the insane speeds at which some creatures kill.

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Killer Three
programme.desc: These are the predators that prove that when it comes to hunting prey, size doesn‚Äôt always matter. These are the World's Deadliest: Little Killers miniscule menaces with the ability to take down prey several times their own size. .

programme.title: World's Deadliest: Whale
programme.desc: Intelligent, cultured and deadly, the killer whale dominates every ocean on earth and as our planet changes, this top predator changes with it. They are elite, marine hunters with an extremely diverse diet including other apex predators like the great white shark. Killer whales pursue their prey like a pack of wolves and have multiple killing techniques. .

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Beloved clinic house cat, Tater, falls ill and the team bands together to save him. Charles debuts a new look, Dr. Pol treats a wood-chewing steer, and Dr. Brenda looks after a lab with stomach issues. A nosey Chihuahua eats a poisonous snack, so Dr. Lisa dispenses a messy antidote and Dr. Nicole jumps in to rescue a mama goat in labor.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: The vets respond to multiple emergencies; a horse seriously traumatized in an accident to a sweet little dog left with a very bad injury to its eye after a fight. Dr. Pol treats a racehorse with a career-threatening hoof injury, while Drs. Nicole and Brenda bring the clinic on the road. A feisty bull reindeer has a badly lacerated antler and there‚Äôs even a guinea fowl needing Dr. Pol‚Äôs help.

programme.title: Cat Wars: Lion vs. Cheetah
programme.desc: Big Cat Wars will showcase an incredibly unique stock footage sequence of a moment when a predator on predator conflict turns deadly.
